pages.text: khaum ka jawaab bajuz us kehne ke aur kuch na tha ke aale looth ko apne shahar se shahar badar kardo, ye to bade paak baaz ban rahe hai
pas hum ne ose aur us ke ahal ko bajuz us ki biwi ke sab ko bacha liya, us ka andaza to baaqi reh jaane waalo mein, hum laga hee chuke thein
aur un par ek qaas (qism ki) baarish barsa di, pas un dhamkaaye hoye logo par buri baarish hoyi
tu kehde ke tamaam tareef Allah hee ke liye hai aur us ke bar-guzida bandho par salaam hai, kya Allah ta’ala behtar hai ya wo jinhe ye log shareek tehra rahe hai

bhala bataao to? ke asmaano aur zameen ko kis ne paida kiya? kis ne asmaan se baarish barsaayi? phir us se hare bhare ba-raunaq baghaath uga diye? un baagho ke daraqto ko tum hargiz na uga sakte, kya Allah ke saath aur koyi maboodh bhi hai? balke ye log hat jaate hai (sidhi raah se)

kya wo jis ne zameen ko qaraar gaah banaya aur us ke darmiyaan nehre jaari kardi aur us ke liye pahaad banaaye aur do samandaro ke darmiyaan rok bana di, kya Allah ke saath aur koyi maboodh bhi hai? balke un mein se aksar kuch jaante hee nahi

bekas ki pukaar ko jab ke wo pukaare, kaun qubool kar ke saqti ko door kar deta hai? aur tumhe zameen ka qalifa banata hai, kya Allah ta’ala ke saath aur maboodh hai? tum bahuth kam nasihath wa ibrath haasil karte ho

kya wo jo tumhe khushki aur tari ki tarikiyo mein raah dikhata hai aur jo apni rehmath se pehle hee khush qabriya dene waali hawaaye chalata hai, kya Allah ke saath koyi aur maboodh bhi hai, jinhe ye shareek karte hai, un sab se Allah bulandh wa baalatar hai
